scripts.start: npm run docker-compose:down && npm run docker-compose:up
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:subscriptions && npm run build:mails && npm run build:package:all
scripts.build:package:all: npm run copy:package:core && npm run copy:package:backend && npm run copy:package:subscriptions && npm run copy:package:mails
scripts.copy:package:core: rm -rf package && mkdir package && mkdir package/packages && cp package*.json package/. && cp lerna.json package/.
scripts.copy:package:backend: rm -rf package/packages/backend && mkdir package/packages/backend && cp -r packages/backend/package/dist package/packages/backend/. && cp packages/backend/package*.json package/packages/backend/.
scripts.copy:package:subscriptions: rm -rf package/packages/subscriptions && mkdir package/packages/subscriptions && cp -r packages/subscriptions/package/dist package/packages/subscriptions/. && cp packages/subscriptions/package*.json package/packages/subscriptions/.
scripts.copy:package:mails: rm -rf package/packages/mails && mkdir package/packages/mails && cp -r packages/mails/package/dist package/packages/mails/. && cp packages/mails/package*.json package/packages/mails/.
